spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural deviations present. The bay window seat from the blueprint is replaced by flat windows. The staircase/crawlspace access hallway is completely missing, replaced by an open void. Room proportions are significantly squashed horizontally.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the roof is removed and there is no text, the model fails to include the Central Hall and technical spaces (WC/Utility) accurately. A generic room is hallucinated where the Utility/WC should be, lacking the specific door configurations of the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen counters and dining table follow the general zone, but the unique 'window seat' fixture is missing. The breakfast bar/pantry wall is misinterpreted as a standalone island.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to stylistic constraints. Perfectly executed low-poly, flat-shaded isometric render on a dark neutral background with no UI or text elements.

detected_errors.description: Missing staircase area and specific bay window structural bump-out.
Misplaced kitchen island hallucinated from a pantry/pendant wall line.
Hallucinated generic empty room in place of specific Utility/WC layout.
